item.title: Sentences for Beginners
item.description: Top 10 Words for Connecting Thoughts in Russian (RussianPod101, 2017, 4 m) From the same channel: 150 Most Common Phrases in Russian (2019, 25 m) 100 Phrases Every Russian Beginner Must-Know (2018, 36 m) Top 25 Must-Know Russian Phrases (2015, 8 m) Learn the Top 10 Must-Know Russian Lines You Need for Introducing Yourself (2015, 5 m) Top Must-Know Expressions for Agreeing and Disagreeing (2017, 5 m) Simple Phrases
